Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (TryFlaggingAs(ServerSockNetChannelState.Closing' ServerSockNetChannelState.Bound))              {                  SockNetLogger.Log(SockNetLogger.LogLevel.INFO' this' "Unbinding from [{0}]..."' LocalEndpoint);                    foreach (RemoteSockNetChannel remoteChannel in remoteChannels.Values)                  {                      remoteChannel.Close().WaitForValue(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5));                  }                    Socket.Close();                    this.State = ServerSockNetChannelState.Closed;                    SockNetLogger.Log(SockNetLogger.LogLevel.INFO' this' "Not bound to [{0}]."' bindEndpoint);              }
